In the argument stage, Mr. Aplomb makes his argument.  In the rebuttal stage, Ms. Esprit attacks the argument. In the counter-rebuttal stage, Mr. Aplomb attacks the rebuttal and supports the argument.  This mini-lesson is about the counter-rebuttal stage in which Mr. Aplomb attacks Ms. Esprit's rebuttal and provides more support for his own argument.\" src=\"data:image/png;base64,\" /></p>","headerText":"How do you counter a rebuttal?"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":0},"leftText":"<p>Here are three strategies you can use to counter a rebuttal:&nbsp;<br />&nbsp;</p><ul style=\"padding-left: 15px;\"><li>If the rebuttal is based on<strong> facts or data</strong>, point out flaws or gaps in the information.<br />&nbsp;</li><li>If the rebuttal is based on <strong>logic</strong>, attack the logic.<br />&nbsp;</li><li>If the rebuttal is based on <strong>expert opinion</strong>, try to discredit it.<br />&nbsp;</li></ul>","rightText":null,"headerText":""},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":0,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":1,"showRFB":0},"leftText":"<p>Person A and Person B are having an argument about motorcycle helmets.&nbsp; Person A claims that all motorcycle riders should be required to wear a helmet because it reduces the risk of injury.<br /><br /><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">Person A&#39;s factual evidence:&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></p><p style=\"margin-left: 40px;\"><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;\">Every study in the past 10 years has shown that wearing a helmet dramatically decreases the number of brain injuries caused by motorcycle accidents.</span></p><p><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">Person B&#39;s rebuttal:&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></p><p style=\"margin-left: 40px;\"><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;\">4 studies within the last year have shown that for males aged 18 &ndash; 21, wearing a helmet does not necessarily decrease the number of brain injuries.</span></p>","rightText":null},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":0},"leftText":"<p>How would you counter Person B&#39;s rebuttal by challenging the<strong> facts</strong>?<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><jumc ju-mc=\"mc_38765d0c-f3ba-d68e-e6bb-7ce57c2abf9d\" style=\"width: 200px; background: rgb(163, 228, 255) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; -moz-user-select: none;\">MC Placeholder<br /><strong>ID: mc_3876...</strong></jumc></p>","headerText":""},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":0,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":1,"showRFB":0},"leftText":"<p><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">Person A&#39;s logical evidence:&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></p><p style=\"margin-left: 40px;\"><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;\">The most serious injuries associated with motorcycle accidents are head injuries, which helmets help prevent.</span></p><p><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">Person B&#39;s rebuttal:&nbsp; </span></p><p style=\"margin-left: 40px;\"><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;\">Unfortunately motorcycle riders are unprotected and can suffer many kinds of injuries other than head injuries.</span></p>","rightText":null},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":0},"leftText":"<p>How would you counter Person B&#39;s rebuttal by challenging its<strong> logic</strong>?<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><jumc ju-mc=\"mc_5d4f6928-704a-846f-b2c4-8a55a80c7bf2\" style=\"width: 200px; background: rgb(163, 228, 255) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; -moz-user-select: none;\">MC Placeholder<br /><strong>ID: mc_5d4f...</strong></jumc></p>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":0,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":1,"showRFB":0},"leftText":"<p><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">Person A&#39;s expert opinion:&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></p><p style=\"margin-left: 40px;\"><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;\">Dr. Cranium, an expert in emergency medicine, has seen a dramatic decrease in serious injuries over the last 10 years in states that require motorcycle riders to wear a helmet. </span></p><p><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">Person B&#39;s rebuttal:&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></p><p style=\"margin-left: 40px;\"><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;\">Dr. Cyclops, an expert in ophthalmology, has conducted studies that show that wearing a helmet can limit a motorcycle rider&rsquo;s range of vision and is itself dangerous.&nbsp;</span></p>","rightText":null},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":0},"leftText":"<p>How would you counter Person B&#39;s rebuttal by challenging or discrediting the <strong>expert opinion</strong>?<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><jumc ju-mc=\"mc_d098d0e0-fcba-ace7-4c0d-837e5774fc74\" style=\"width: 200px; background: rgb(163, 228, 255) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; -moz-user-select: none;\">MC Placeholder<br /><strong>ID: mc_d098...</strong></jumc></p>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":0,"showHeader":1,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>In the case of Aplomb vs. Esprit, Mr. Aplomb&#39;s first counter is to challenge Ms. Esprit&#39;s facts.<br /><br /><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">From Mr. Aplomb&#39;s argument:</span></p><p style=\"margin-left: 40px;\"><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;\">Local ordinances prohibit making noises that are above a certain decibel level.</span></p><p><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">From Ms. Esprit&#39;s rebuttal:</span></p><p style=\"margin-left: 40px;\"><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;\">The noise ordinance applies only after midnight on weekdays and after 1:00 a.m. on weekends.</span></p>","rightText":null,"headerText":"How does Mr. Aplomb answer Ms. Esprit's rebuttal?"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>Which counter-rebuttal can Mr. Aplomb use to challenge Ms. Esprit&#39;s facts?<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><jumc ju-mc=\"mc_0e4a1ebe-7d00-193e-4ad1-5aa96e1d4e38\" style=\"width: 200px; background: rgb(163, 228, 255) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; -moz-user-select: none;\">MC Placeholder<br /><strong>ID: mc_0e4a...</strong></jumc></p>","headerText":""},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":0,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":1,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>Next, Mr. Aplomb attacks Ms. Esprit&#39;s logic.<br /><br /><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">From Mr. Aplomb&#39;s argument:</span></p><p style=\"margin-left: 40px;\"><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;\">When people buy property they expect to be able to enjoy it.</span></p><p><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">From Ms. Esprit&#39;s rebuttal:</span></p><p style=\"margin-left: 40px;\"><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;\">Other people have the right to enjoy their property, too.</span></p>","rightText":null},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>Which counter-rebuttal can Mr. Aplomb use to argue with Ms. Esprit&#39;s logic?<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><jumc ju-mc=\"mc_bc64b663-bc5f-f654-8a53-919fb4c11de2\" style=\"width: 200px; background: rgb(163, 228, 255) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; -moz-user-select: none;\">MC Placeholder<br /><strong>ID: mc_bc64...</strong></jumc></p>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":0,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":1,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>Mr. Aplomb comes up with a way to either challenge or discredit Ms. Esprit&#39;s expert opinions.<br /><br /><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">From Mr. Aplomb&#39;s argument:</span></p><p style=\"margin-left: 40px;\"><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;\">According to the respected Doctor Kronkheit, medical science shows that if people do not get enough sleep, they cannot function in their daily lives.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">From Ms. Esprit&#39;s rebuttal:</span></p><p style=\"margin-left: 40px;\"><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;\">Other medical authorities, such as the esteemed Dr. Boop, say that while sleep is one component of good health, enjoying yourself and having fun is also essential to good health.</span></p>","rightText":null},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>Which counter-rebuttal can Mr. Aplomb use to rebut Ms. Esprit&#39;s expert opinions?<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><jumc ju-mc=\"mc_b53c9d2a-c9f5-6e5c-999a-b21db6173497\" style=\"width: 200px; background: rgb(163, 228, 255) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; -moz-user-select: none;\">MC Placeholder<br /><strong>ID: mc_b53c...</strong></jumc></p>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":1,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>Sometimes it is not possible to counter or argue against every point of a rebuttal.&nbsp; That is not a problem; the goal is to have an argument that is as strong as possible.<br /><br />For example, Mr. Aplomb could not counter this point from Ms. Esprit&#39;s rebuttal:<br /><br /><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;\">Finally, living in a community always involves some noise, such as lawnmowers, airplanes overhead, and children playing.&nbsp; It is not reasonable to expect to live in a noise-free environment. </span><br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":null},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":0,"showHeader":1,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>An effective counter-rebuttal addresses as many weaknesses in the rebuttal as possible.&nbsp; It is possible to challenge the rebuttal&#39;s facts, logic, or expert opinion, or any other ways the rebuttal is weak.</p>","rightText":"<table border=\"2\" cellpadding=\"1\" cellspacing=\"1\" class=\"ju-tableplain\" style=\"width: 100%;\"><tbody><tr><td><p><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">Mr. Aplomb&#39;s counter-rebuttal:</span><br /><br />The noise from Ms. Esprit&#39;s house occurred after midnight on a Thursday and at 2:00 a.m. on a Saturday, so the noise ordinance supports my argument.&nbsp; Furthermore, Ms. Esprit&#39;s enjoyment of her property shouldn&#39;t be allowed to interfere with my enjoyment of my property.&nbsp; While it may be true that having fun decreases stress levels, other authorities state that listening to excessive noise raises stress levels, as well as interfering with sleep.</p></td></tr></tbody></table><p>&nbsp;</p>","headerText":"Putting it all together"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<table border=\"1\" cellpadding=\"1\" cellspacing=\"1\" class=\"ju-powertip\" style=\"width: 100%;\"><thead><tr><th scope=\"col\">Tip!</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td>Most arguments do not take place in a courtroom, but a court case illustrates the process of making an argument and defending it.&nbsp; So, when you make an argument, think about how another person could rebut what you are arguing.&nbsp; Answering this person with an effective counter-rebuttal will make your whole argument stronger. &nbsp;</td></tr></tbody></table><p>&nbsp;</p>","rightText":null}],"overviewHeader":"Overview","inputData":{"mc_38765d0c-f3ba-d68e-e6bb-7ce57c2abf9d":{"displayType":"MC","noOfChoices":3,"selectdTry":2,"selectedColumn":1,"choices":[{"text":"Some of the  studies mentioned by Person B were paid for by Harley Davidson.","fixed":false,"incFeedback":"This does not address the factual accuracy of the studies."},{"text":"The 4 studies mentioned by Person B actually showed that wearing a helmet decreases the number of brain injuries for riders in all age groups.","fixed":false,"incFeedback":""},{"fixed":false,"text":"I have ridden a motorcycle for years and have never had an accident.","incFeedback":"Your personal experience or opinion, no matter how strong, is not a fact."},{"fixed":false},{"fixed":false}],"selectedTry":2,"correct":1,"correctFeedback":"This answer to the rebuttal challenges a fact with good, relevant information.","incorrectFeedback":"This does not address the factual accuracy of the studies."},"mc_5d4f6928-704a-846f-b2c4-8a55a80c7bf2":{"displayType":"MC","noOfChoices":3,"selectdTry":2,"selectedColumn":1,"choices":[{"text":"70% of the motorcycle riders who had accidents and were treated at Stronger Memorial Hospital last year suffered head injuries.","fixed":false,"incFeedback":"This is a statistic.  It does not attack the logic of the rebuttal."},{"text":"Head injuries are by far the most serious and debilitating injuries suffered by motorcycle riders.","fixed":false,"incFeedback":""},{"fixed":false,"text":"The government is already too involved in our daily lives and should not pass laws that limit our choices.","incFeedback":"This is an opinion and does not attack the logic of the rebuttal."},{"fixed":false},{"fixed":false}],"selectedTry":2,"correct":1,"correctFeedback":"This is a good answer to the rebuttal. (TISOME)","fixed":false},{"text":"I wear a helmet and it doesnâ€™t limit my vision.","fixed":false,"incFeedback":"Your personal experience does not address Dr. Cyclops's credibility."},{"fixed":false,"text":"Most of Dr. Cyclops's patients find him annoying, because he is always showing them pictures of his motorcycle.","incFeedback":"A personal attack is not an acceptable form of argument."},{"fixed":false},{"fixed":false}],"selectedTry":2,"correctFeedback":"This shows that Dr. Cyclops could be biased, and discredits his expert opinion.","correct":0},"mc_37285b96-9ce2-3065-ce4e-fedeb4fffc76":{"displayType":"MC","noOfChoices":3,"selectdTry":2,"selectedColumn":1,"choices":[{"text":"Ms. Landis has no right to talk about wages in the workplace because she is an overpaid CEO who is out of touch with working people.","fixed":false},{"text":"Mr. Smith is a good writer, but he is not an expert on compensation; he is merely expressing his opinion.","fixed":false,"incFeedback":"This statement questions Mr. Smith's qualifications for stating his opinion.  It does not attack Mr. Smith's character.  Which statement argues against a person rather than an argument?"},{"fixed":false,"text":"Teresa Jenkins, who has been studying compensation patterns in the United States for more than twenty years, is a reliable expert on compensation issues.","incFeedback":"This is not an <i>ad hominem</i> argument; to the contrary, it praises Teresa Jenkins."},{"fixed":false},{"fixed":false}],"selectedTry":2,"correct":0,"correctFeedback":"This statement attacks Ms. Landis rather than advancing or rebutting the argument."},"mc_bc64b663-bc5f-f654-8a53-919fb4c11de2":{"displayType":"MC","noOfChoices":3,"selectdTry":2,"selectedColumn":1,"choices":[{"text":"Ms. Esprit's enjoyment of her property shouldn't be allowed to interfere with my enjoyment of my property.","fixed":false},{"text":"Actually, those who own animals do not have the right to enjoy their property.  Those without pets have more property rights than those who have pets.","fixed":false,"incFeedback":"Not only does this statement not challenge Ms. Esprit's logic, it is not logical itself.  Which statement makes good, logical sense?"},{"fixed":false,"incFeedback":"This is not logical because it is too extreme.   Even if Ms. Esprit sometimes disturbs her neighbors she still has the right to enjoy her property.","text":"Ms. Esprit forfeited her right to enjoy her property when she started disturbing her neighbors."},{"fixed":false},{"fixed":false}],"selectedTry":2,"correct":0,"correctFeedback":"This counter-rebuttal effectively makes the point that all property owners should be permitted to enjoy their property, not just Ms. Esprit."},"mc_b53c9d2a-c9f5-6e5c-999a-b21db6173497":{"displayType":"MC","noOfChoices":3,"selectdTry":2,"selectedColumn":1,"choices":[{"text":"While it may be true that having fun decreases stress, other authorities state that listening to excessive noise raises stress levels as well as interfering with sleep.","fixed":false},{"text":"Doctor Boop is a quack who doesn't know what he's talking about.","fixed":false,"incFeedback":"This is a personal attack. It is not an acceptable counter-rebuttal."},{"fixed":false,"text":"According to the president of the Hi Gamma Gamma fraternity, having fun is more important than sleeping.","incFeedback":"The president of a college fraternity is not an expert on noise and sleep issues."},{"fixed":false},{"fixed":false}],"selectedTry":2,"correct":0,"correctFeedback":"This statement uses respected authorities to fairly respond to Ms. Esprit's point."},"mc_0e4a1ebe-7d00-193e-4ad1-5aa96e1d4e38":{"displayType":"MC","noOfChoices":3,"selectdTry":2,"selectedColumn":1,"choices":[{"text":"Unfortunately for Ms. Esprit, the noise from her house occurred after midnight on Thursday and at 2:00 a.m. on a Saturday.","fixed":false},{"text":"Ms. Esprit makes too much noise, especially at night.","fixed":false,"incFeedback":"This is not challenging the facts.  This is an opinion."},{"fixed":false,"text":"The laws in place are too lax. There should be a law that prohibits noise at all times, 24 hours a day.","incFeedback":"This is an opinion that does not address whether or not the noise ordinance was in effect."},{"fixed":false},{"fixed":false}],"selectedTry":2,"correct":0,"correctFeedback":"This is a strong counter-rebuttal because it shows that the noise ordinance was in effect, and Ms. Esprit was violating it."}},"rightFloatText":"<table border=\"2\" cellpadding=\"1\" cellspacing=\"1\" class=\"ju-tableplain\"><tbody><tr><td><p><span class=\"ju-cktitle\" style=\"color:#025B5B;font-family:lato,sans-serif;font-size:22px;font-weight:bold;\">Neighbor sues neighbor</span><br /><br /><span class=\"ju-labels\" style=\"color:#59595B;font-family:tahoma;font-weight:bold;\">Ms. Esprit&#39;s rebuttal:</span><br /><br />You do not have the right to sleep without being disturbed, because the noise ordinance applies only after midnight on weekdays and after 1:00 a.m. on weekends.&nbsp; Furthermore, other people have the right to enjoy their property, too.&nbsp; In addition, medical authorities such as the esteemed Dr. Boop say that while sleep is one component of good health, enjoying yourself and having fun is also essential to good health.&nbsp; Finally, living in a community always involves some noise, such as lawnmowers, airplanes overhead, and children playing.&nbsp; It is not reasonable to expect a noise-free environment.</p></td></tr></tbody></table><p>&nbsp;</p>"}
